name: pjax-pwa-overlay-example
description: A set of mustache templates to be used with express-mustache-overlays and bootstrap-flexbox-overlay that add PJAX (PushState+AJAX) and Progressive Web App support to a project.

scripts.docker:build: echo 'Docker cannnot copy files from a parent directory so we need to put the current dev version of pjax-pwa-overlay in this directory and change package.json'; mkdir -p pjax-pwa-overlay ; rsync --delete --exclude='example' --exclude='*.DS_Store' --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' -aHxv ../ pjax-pwa-overlay/ ; cat package.json | sed -e 's|file:..|file:pjax-pwa-overlay|g' > package.json.docker ; docker build . -t thejimmyg/pjax-pwa-overlay:0.1.0

author: JimmyG
